title: Lost LP again due to bugged client
body: Since the new client has come out. this happens ever so often to me and it never did before the client update. I would understand this in testing of the client but when it has been fully released for some time now, its ridiculous. I am trying to climb and this happening is not helping at all. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
That really sucks, sorry it happened to you.  :(  It looks like your could have some bad game files preventing you from seeing these assets, but other factors could be involved too like an unstable connection.  To start off, enable [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode in case the fancy aesthetics is causing too much stress during champ select.  Test it in a custom game though, so you don't run into any penalties!

Should the issue continue, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a repair.  This should clear up any potentially bad game files.

Test these in customs, and let me know if it helps!

Literally after posting this I tried again to do ranked. And at this point I feel like both the client and ranked are bugged because it has happened to me again. 

http://prntscr.com/fix456

I just want to climb and i cant if everytime i want to do ranked i just lose lp instantly
